The Bakerloo Line, colored brown on the London Underground maps, was opened in March 1906. The line will start from Harrow & Wealdstone station in north-west London to Elephant & Castle station in south London. The Bakerloo line addresses a distance of 23km (14.5 miles) and serves twenty five tube stations.

Outlined below are 8 of the 25 tube stations that most visitors use when they check out London.

Wembley Central station is found across the street from Wembley Stadium and is close to Wembley Arena.

Wembley Stadium is the residence floor of the English Countrywide Soccer (Soccer) team. It is also the venue in which the Carling Cup Final and The FA Cup Final are held. It has a seating ability of ninety,000 and is a common venue for other sports occasions and key concerts.

Wembley Arena is an indoor arena and is an internationally renowned concert venue. The arena can seat twelve,500 fans and has noticed stars like Abba, Bon Jovi, Cliff Richard, The Eagles and Westlife conduct there.

Wembley Industry is one of the largest Sunday markets in the United kingdom and is located outdoors Wembley Stadium.

Warwick Voie station is the cease for Little Venice and the Grand Union & Regent's Canal.

Right here you can get pleasure from the tranquil canal location, stroll together rather streets or consider a stress-free boat excursion to the London Zoo.

Paddington station is a single of the major railway stations in London. This is the station in which visitors just take the Heathrow Express to Heathrow Airport. There are several 4 and five star hotels inside of simple walking distance to Paddington station. There is also a superior assortment of eating places serving exotic cuisines.

Baker Street station is the halt for Madame Tussauds Wax Museum and Sherlock Holmes Museum. You also get off right here for Regent's Park and the London Central Mosque. Baker Street station is a single of the busiest tube stations in the London Underground program.

Oxford Circus station is in which you get off to do your purchasing. This is the intersection wherever Oxford Road and Regent Road meet. This is the busiest purchasing district in London with numerous significant division merchants like John Lewis, Debenhams and Home of Fraser are located.

Bond Road, renowned for its costly designer outfits, and Selfridges Division Shop are a small distance away, west of Oxford Circus station. Carnaby Street and the famous Hamley Toy Store are also a small distance absent from right here.

Piccadilly Circus station is the cease for the Statue of Eros, West Conclude Theatreland and the London Chinatown. There are quite a few theatres along Shaftesbury Avenue and Charing Cross Road.

London Chinatown, with quite a lot of excellent Chinese dining establishments and supermarkets, is located south of Shaftesbury Avenue concerning Piccadilly Circus and Leicester Square. The dining establishments are often occupied especially in advance of and after theatre displays.

Piccadilly Circus is the venue for London nightlife with heaps of pubs, clubs and eating places for the locals as very well as tourists.

Stop at Charing Cross station if you are going to Trafalgar Square & Nelson's Column.

Other tourist attractions all around Trafalgar Square contain the Nationwide Gallery, the Countrywide Portrait Gallery and St Martin-in-the Fields Church. Ben White Boulevard, Austin TX 78741.
